refsection.para: Displays all regions of a MUVES_Component attribute that are set to any of the specified value arguments. The C option specifies a color to draw the regions.

The first example shows how to use the em command to display all regions having particular attributes. The second example shows how to use the em command to display in green all regions having particular attributes.

info.title: Display all regions having a particular attribute.

listitem.para: Displays all regions that have MUVES_Component attributes equal to engine or pilot.

info.title: Display in a particular color all regions having a particular attribute.

example.para: Displays in green all regions that have MUVES_Component attributes equal to hydraulics.
